import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; //Library React Router Dom import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; //Library React Bootstrap import Rating from "../components/Rating"; //import products from "../products"; //used to read the products.js import axios from 'axios' function ProductScreen() { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) //using the useParams (using the new version) const { id } = useParams(); //get the Product ID //const product = products.find((p) => p._id === id); //find the related product using the id useEffect(() => { async function fetchProduct() { const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/products/${id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, [id]) return(
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}
) }; export default ProductScreen;
